conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric transformation into an isometric-style cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation; wall thickness and floor plane transitions are precise.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the floor plan. Wall positions, room adjacencies, and window/door placements are highly accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Nearly all furniture and fixtures match the 2D layout. Added dining chairs and TV unit enhance the space logically.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean rendering; consistent materials. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The balcony railing style is simplified compared to the plan, but correctly placed.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D transformation that preserves all architectural details and room proportions.
